meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Giving Up the Dollar In Favor of the Euro Countries with large dollar holdings are showing a new willingness to dump the dollar in favor of the euro as the American currency continues a steady slide that began in late 2005.
BUSINESS DAY, PAGE C1
Same-Sex Marriage Setback Massachusetts legislators voted to advance a constitutional amendment defining marriage as the union between a man and a woman.
PAGE A12
Teddy Kollek Is Dead The mayor of Jerusalem from 1965 to 1993, who worked to develop the city as Israel's capital and unite its two halves, he was 95.
PAGE A18
Love Him or Hate Him Coach Jim Tressel, who has led Ohio State to the brink of a college football championship, stirs emotions.
SPORTSWEDNESDAY, PAGE D1
Caviar Export Bans Lifted Exports of some types of Caspian Sea caviar will resume after an improvement in the monitoring of endangered sturgeon.
DINING, PAGE F3

Giving Up the Dollar In Favor of the Euro Countries with large dollar holdings are showing a new willingness to dump the dollar in favor of the euro as the American currency continues a steady slide that began in late 2005.
BUSINESS DAY, PAGE C1
Same-Sex Marriage Setback Massachusetts legislators voted to advance a constitutional amendment defining marriage as the union between a man and a woman.
PAGE A12
Teddy Kollek Is Dead The mayor of Jerusalem from 1965 to 1993, who worked to develop the city as Israel's capital and unite its two halves, he was 95.
PAGE A18
Love Him or Hate Him Coach Jim Tressel, who has led Ohio State to the brink of a college football championship, stirs emotions.
SPORTSWEDNESDAY, PAGE D1
Caviar Export Bans Lifted Exports of some types of Caspian Sea caviar will resume after an improvement in the monitoring of endangered sturgeon.
DINING, PAGE F3
